page.title: 18THE FREE PRESS, HELMSHORE.
page.content:
The Rossendale Free Press is a weekly paper containing the weeks news in Rossendale. The valley of Rossendale contains three towns and several villages.
The paper has one printing machine which produces about 16,000 papers per week. The Free Press has got 12 delivery vans. It has a staff of 16 people, including 8 journalists. The word "free" is used because the paper is free from any political party.
News stories come from Rochdale, Crawshawbooth, Bacup, Waterfoot, Helmshore and Ramsbottom. Each weekly publication is issued on a Friday lunchtime.
